meanings.definition: An animal that is smaller or weaker than others in a litter.
meanings.sent1: The runt of the puppies struggled to keep up with its siblings.
meanings.sent2: The farmer noticed the runt piglet and made sure it got extra care.
meanings.sent3: The runt of the litter may be small, but it has a big heart.
meanings.sent4: Despite being the runt, the kitten showed immense determination to survive.
meanings.sent5: The runt's size didn't hinder its playful spirit.

meanings.definition: A small or undersized person or thing.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the runt of the plants still managed to bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The runt of the litter was always the last one picked for games.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was the runt, his kindness made him stand out.
meanings.sent4: The runt of the team surprised everyone with their hidden talent.
meanings.sent5: Despite being a runt, the tiny bird sang the loudest.
